oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mountain scenery
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph shows some mountain scenery as seen from a road in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.

The establishment of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park and better roads in Tennessee created one of the state's first tourist attractions. Today, the Great Smoky Mountains National Park is one of the most visited national parks in the United States.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Great Smoky Mountains National Park (N.C. and Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Great Smoky Mountains National Park (N.C. and Tenn.)
